As we emerge from the pandemic, our educators and our schools need support to ensure bright futures for our children and our planet. 

The Green New Deal for Public Schools Act provides an opportunity to bolster our education system while centering the needs of our environment.
The Green New Deal for Public Schools Act would also provide funding to hire thousands of additional educators and support staff - creating over 1.3 million jobs per year over the next ten years.

This legislation would make transformational investments to upgrade every public school in the country - including in our most marginalized communities - providing funds to construct new highly energy-efficient, zero-carbon schools, or convert existing facilities.

To combat climate change, we must ensure that our infrastructure is sustainable and resilient, and our children should benefit from green infrastructure first and foremost.
